TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AdCreatedEventHandler(object sender, AdCreatedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AdCreatedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AdCreatedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AdCreatedEventArgs)
public delegate void AdCreatedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AdCreatedEventArgs ^ e);
type AdCreatedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AdCreatedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件在页面上显示广告时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the control displays an advertisement on the page. 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 它获取在创建控件时与播发关联的 URL 并将其显示在控件下。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control gets created and displays it below the control. 此示例需要以下示例中所列 ( # A0) 的 XML 文件。This example requires the XML file (Ads.xml) listed in the example below. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. 有关 XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅 类的属性 。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. [!code-xml[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/Common/App_Data/Ads.xml#2)] [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
